name: Strategic Color War
description:
Played with Mouse/Trackpad + Keyboard.

Real online multiplayer (get a friend to play if you're not finding any matches).

Plan your moves and attack during the "planning" phase (8 seconds).
Watch your plan unfold during the "simulation" phase (also 8 seconds).

Successfully predict the movements of your opponent (the other white orb) and attack to win.

Collect colored orbs to gain attacks. The more orbs you've gathered TOGETHER, the STRONGER you will be.

"M" to move around and collect colored orbs.

"1,2,3" to attack after you've collected colored orbs.

*** it's my first time making an online multiplayer game so it's likely buggy ***

Thanks for playing anyway...
